channel.title: Music – and Loathing in Las Vegas
channel.description: Recent content in and Loathing in Las Vegas on Music

item.title: Fear,and Loathing in Las Vegas - Rave-up Tonight ("機動戦士ガンダム EXTREME VS."OP)
item.description:
All

right?

Dancing floor

for you is ready

Step on a step

Don’t be so shy

Carry on Carry on

Dance with us! oh

Stomp hard on the beat

Let’s start together

Dive into the

bass drums you hear

This sxxx is

still just a dxxx

Warm up you know

yeah

Oh!

Let us get high now!

Oh!

Let us get

Extremely high

right now!

“Dxxx it” “Dxxx it”

She is still not

Turning back

to me today

I can never be honest

to myself

I’m about to give

it all up after all

The day

I was waiting for

(It’s the day

I was waiting for)

The moment

suddenly appeared

When I stood

on that low stage

You were there

in the front

Row of the crowd!

All right?

Dancing floor

for you is ready

Step on a step

Don’t be so shy

Carry on Carry on

Dance with us! oh

Stomp hard on the beat

Let’s start together

I just want to see

your biggest smile

Might seem

like a dream

But it ain’t,

it is here yeah

Oh yeah!

Let us get high now!

There are people

inside you

Just can’t deal with

So it ain’t easy

To gather hearts

to one ah

Fighting

since monkeys,

And probably will be

the same now on

Still fighting, just

like the ancient days

We are still fighting

from ages ago

But here, there is

a drip of hope

Making big noise,

and we come along

With the flow

of the noise

And we can

become one

There is

a small little hope

La la la la la la la

“Dance tune it is” ah

We have been

hitting the floor

From the days

we were born

Sound will

keep changing

But what we do

won’t change

We have been

hitting the floor

From when

we were born

It’s all the same

since we were apes

item.title: Fear,and Loathing in Las Vegas - Take Me Out!!
item.description:
Why aren’t you

meeting me tonight?

I am tired

waiting for you

I want to see you

tonight…

(I want to see you

tonight…)

Why don’t you

pick me up?

It’s boring here

I’m already

Sick of twisting

my hair…

(Sick of twisting

my hair…)

You are a little,

fickle,(and)pickle man

Making me

falling in love

Come

get me

Or (else) I’ll wash

my hands off you!

Take me out!

To the dance hall!

Let me out!

To the ball dance!

I want to

be with you

(And) dance

’til the sun rise up

So, take me out!

To the dance hall!

Let me out!

To the ball dance!

I want to

dance with you

Under

the moon light

White ball dress (and)

shiny glass high heel

You would

love to see

Come

hug me

Or (else) I’ll wash

my hands off you!

(Or I’ll wash

my hands off you!)

Take me out!

To the dance hall!

Let me out!

To the ball dance!

I want to

be with you

(And) dance

’til the sun rise up

So, take me out!

To the dance hall!

Let me out!

To the ball dance!

I want to

dance with you

Under

the moon light

Will you take my hands

(and) dance with me?

And, will you say

that you love me?

I love you

from my heart

Can you

take me out?

Say that

you’re ready to go

Do not keep me

waiting here

(Or) I’ll

hate you!

Tale, Wizard,

Ball Dance, Mid-night,

Glass

High Heels

I have read that story

in the past

The story

of a poor girl

What a fool!

Oh what a fool she is!

Leaving the price

all alone

How stupid

she is!

Couldn’t she have

just stayed with him!?

Oh, I wish he will

come pick me up…

I am just like

(a) sad Cinderella!

Please let me

get out!

I want to

see you tonight!

Take me out!

To the dance hall!

Let me out!

To the ball dance!

I want to be with you

(and) dance

‘Til the sun rise up

(Take me out!)

Take me out!

To the dance hall!

Let me out!

To the ball dance!

I want to

dance with you

Under

the moon light

Will you take my hands

(and) dance with me?

And, will you say

that you love me?

I love you

from my heart

Can you

take me out?

Say that

you’re ready to go

Do not keep me

waiting here

(Or) I’ll hate

you!

item.title: Fear,and Loathing in Las Vegas - Virtue and Vice ("極黒のブリュンヒルデ"OP)
item.description:
Yeah Don’t know what’s

being misunderstood

Missiles flying,

children getting shot

Swindles

everywhere

People who should be

the most loved ones,

Killing each other

Once you

Keep an eye off,

things get stolen

The world is

like this

The world

we don’t know

The unknown

world

Out of our hands

It don’t matter

Covering it up,

acting like

You don’t see

a thing

If you think

it’s a different thing

You won’t notice that

the world you live in

Is eventually hitting

towards this matter

Look at it

Oh yeah!

The world is

all linked together

Save our loved

ones and the world

These peaceful days

lasting is a wish

Because

I have no idea

How many tickets

“to live today” are

Even at the time when

you were playing cards

Somewhere

in the world,

Somebody is crying

Us to one

Let me hear

your voice!

Oi oi oi oi

oi oi oi oi oi…

It still is

way to quite!

Oi oi oi oi

oi oi oi oi

Oi oi oi oi

oi oi oi oi

We all have

weaknesses

Losing against

it is the end

Don’t limit

yourself

Don’t limit

yourself yeah

Got to change them

Got to change them

(Got to change them)

Raise your voice

To fight it out

against your weak self

We sure do

gotta change them

We sure do

gotta change them

The raising

worries,

The falling

cold sweats

On the back

(on the back)

Backing off saying

“can not

Make it happen”

(Breakin’ down)

You really think

(that way)?

You really think

(that way)?

Shake it off and

move on (Come on!)

Shake it off

and move on

Just you are my love

Your pure feeling

That beautiful voice

It’s so valuable

I wanna stay with you,

not only tonight

The words

that fell from you

(But

from now on)

Let us change it

to connect tomorrow

Let’s sing

until our voices die

There must be

many walls

There must be

times

You will be

breaking down

But this song is

there for you

item.title: Fear,and Loathing in Las Vegas - Just Awake ("HUNTERxHUNTER"ED)
item.description:
가사낫테타 무네노 오토
かさ/////むね//おと/
重なってた胸の音
유사붓테모 기코에나이
ゆ//////き/
揺さぶっても聴こえない
고보레오치타
///お/
こぼれ落ちた
피-스

ピース
곤나 니치죠오노
///にち/じょう/
こんな日常の
유-우츠사에
ゆう/うつ/
憂鬱さえ
다메이키모 데즈니
//いき//で/
ため息も出ずに
무칸죠오나 보쿠라
む/かん/じょう//ぼく/
無感情な僕ら

Life filled

with vanity

Colors

have faded

Things you desire

exist here

Flee from this

colorless world
츠기하기노 고코로와
/////こころ/
つぎはぎの心は
후안테-
ふ/あん/てい /
不安定
아라이나가사레타
あら//なが/
洗い流された
쇼키쇼-도-오
しょ/き/しょう/どう/
初期衝動を
요비사마시테
よ//さ/
呼び覚まして
하시리다세
はし//だ/
走り出せ
츠타나이 고토바
つたな//こと/ば/
拙い言葉
오모우 마마니 츠나구요
おも/////つな/
思うままに繋ぐよ
아노 히노 고도오
//ひ// こ/どう /
あの日の鼓動
와스레나이데
わす/
忘れないで

Oh my lord, it’s gone!

What shall I do?

Pieces I had

have fell apart

Where do you

belong?

Where should I

aim (for)?

Once

you’ve lost sight

It’s left

to fall apart

Let’s start it

over again

Rebuild

and combine

All the pieces

we have lost

To become one

Like a puzzle

Take it one

at a time

When I stopped

(a) rusted chain

Has tangled me

up

Tying my body

onto the ground

As I sink underground

I call your name

What can I do

to see

The day light

once more?

Tear it apart

and rip it off

Break the chain now

sink down or swim up

Fight your way through

seek your way out

If you can not,

you are left

To drown

deep inside

Chain tangled me

harder,

Chocking

my neck
츠요갓테타 보쿠노 고토
つよ/////ぼく/
強がってた僕のこと
미마못테타 기미와 유우
み/まも ////きみ//ゆ/
見守ってた君は言う
이마
いま/
今
고코니 이루요

ここにいるよ
이츠마데모

いつまでも
기에나이 오모이오
き////おも/
消えない思いを
츠나기토메라레타
///と/
つなぎ止められた
쇼키쇼-도-오
しょ/き/しょう/どう/
初期衝動を
요비사마시테
よ//さ/
呼び覚まして
하시리다세
はし//だ/
走り出せ
아노 히노
//ひ/
あの日の
고도오와
こ/どう /
鼓動は
보쿠토 기미노 나카노 우추-데
ぼく//きみ//なか//う/ちゅう/
僕と君の中の宇宙で
히비이테 이루요
ひび/
響いているよ

Yeah

Misery is nothing

It is all up to your

thoughts and beliefs

To bring in success

within your life

Don’t you compare

yourself

With other people

that’s a waste of

Person you are

so why not be honest

To your emotion
와스레나이데
わす/
忘れないで

All the promises

made between us

Broke in pieces

(and) turned into sand

Let’s escape from

this colorless world

To find myself and

tomorrow(that)we live

item.title: Fear,and Loathing in Las Vegas - Let Me Hear ("寄生獣 セイの格率"OP)
item.description:
You guys

do not notice

That we are gifted

just by being humans

We are

absolute predators

We do not even

have any enemies

Maybe there are

other animals

Watching us

and thinking that

Someday “we will

beat them down”

Oh We have the brains

to think hard

Wear

our favorite clothes

We are

at no doubt

Human beings

Many small lives

They were born

[They were born]

With the fate

[with the fate]

Of dying for someone

A human baby

When will

they find out

That at the point

they were born, we are

[We are winners]

(the) winners of Earth
아아

ああ
히토리 나이테 이타
///な/
ひとり泣いていた
도나리노 기미가

となりのきみが
도이카케루
と/
問いかける
다카라 보쿠라 요리소이
///ぼく//よ//そ/
だから僕ら寄り添い
이키루 기라메쿠마데
い////きら/
生きる 煌めくまで

For what have I

been living for?

When will I find out

the answer?

An answer

that is only for you

What will myself

and (the)

First scenery I saw

Look like?

It’s my face,

my face

Shut up!

I read this inside

The book

I read before

[The book

I read before]

According

(to) Maslow

[According

(to) Maslow]

There are five steps

(in a) human’s desire

To live

a long long life

To stay safe

and receive [Baby]

Love

from others

To get respect from

[Baby]

Others, To get closer

[Yeah]

To your ideal

[Yeah]

That’s what it said

[Yeah]

No matter how hard

other animals try,

They probably can’t

go over the first step

That is

how intelligent we are

And, filled

with greed

But that is

probably

Why we can still

live on the top

Of the food chain

in this blue planet

Although we have

weak bodies ah
아아 마타 기미노 메니
/////きみ//め/
ああ また君の目に
이츠모노 아사가 우츠리코무
////あさ///うつ//こ/
いつもの朝が 映り込む
나가레루 나미다가
なが////なみだ/
流れる 涙が
기에테 유쿠

きえてゆく

For what

to live for

Think deeply

as you live yeah

Cuz you humans are

(the) only ones

That can do this

on Earth
아타라시이
あたら/
新しい
고타에오
こた/
答えを

What is it

that you want to get

In your right hands?

Let me hear

Tell me

your new answer

Prove that you are

different from monkies

If there is nothing

to crave for,

Humans will die

in a way

Don’t you

think so too?

Let me hear,

Let me hear,

Let me

hear

item.title: Fear,and Loathing in Las Vegas - Chase the Light! ("逆境無頼カイジ 破戒録篇"OP)
item.description:
Woh

Chase the Light!
데오 노바시타노니
て//の/
手を伸ばしたのに
마다 도도카나이
//とど/
まだ届かない
요고토 세이론
よ///せい/ろん/
夜ごと正論
이야니 나루
いや/
嫌になる
벤리나 이이와케오
べん/り//い//わけ/
便利な言い訳を
하이마와루 쇼-도-
は//まわ//しょう/どう/
這い回る衝動

(From) time

to time,

I feel like

running away

Trying to face away

from this situation

But for me

to live

I have to decide

my own way

Take it easy

It’s gonna be alright

Have faith and trust

what a person you are

In times when you feel

lost believe yourself

Overcome

all the enemies Light

Are you ready?

Let’s go!!

Chill out and be

easygoing sometimes

That was what you’ve

told me in bad times
가라마루 이토 호도이타 도키니
から/// い/と /////とき/
絡まる意図ほどいた時に
와라이타이카라
わら/
笑いたいから
마요에루 히비모
まよ/// ひ/び /
迷える日々も
다시카메루
たし/
確かめる
사가세나쿠테
さが/
探せなくて
메오 소라스케도
め//そ/
目を逸らすけど
기미나라 데키루
きみ/// で/き /
君なら出来る
소노 데오 노바세
//て//の/
その手を伸ばせ

Fog hanged over

Making me blind

I cut through the air

with my hand

And then I realized

I ran into

A wonderland

filled with mysteries

I knew

if I kept

Running

without stopping

I will someday find

the way out from here

Take a look around

Light

Each one of us

shares

Different thoughts

and features

No one is

the same

And that’s

what makes us

The only special

Spring has arrived

Season of new life

has come
소오 도오메이데
///とう/めい/
そう 透明で
마바유이 아시타에
///// あ/した /
まばゆい 明日へ

We all face and go

through tough moments

But with the help

of others

We gain the power

to stand up again
